fullText: Cherry Jones brings a deeply lived-in understanding to Amanda Wingfield, the delusional mother who torments her children with her fantasies of genteel Southern living.
dtliExcerpt: Cherry Jones brings a deeply lived-in understanding to Amanda Wingfield, the delusional mother who torments her children with her fantasies of genteel Southern living.
